paper_abstract: NTRU cryptosystem is constructed on the base ring Z. We give suitability conditions on rings to serve as alternate base rings. We present an example of an NTRU-like cryptosystem based on the Eisenstein integers Z[zeta(3)], which has a denser lattice structure than Z for the same dimension, and which furthermore presents a more difficult lattice problem for lattice attacks, for the same level of decryption failure security.
